Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Appropriate score on the UCF Math Placement test, or MAT 1033C with a "C" (2.0) or better, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Introduction to systematic counting, probability, geometry, statistics, sets and logic. This course is intended for students who are not planning to take upper level courses in mathematics.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Beauty & utility of mathematics, patterns & symmetry, voting strategies, & finance. Connections between math & music, art, architecture, & nature. For students not planning to take upper level mathematics.
